data.title: Directing Change
data.meta_description: Please view and download the amazing films created by our young and talented filmmakers and check out this tip sheet for ideas to use the films. You can also check out our hand-outs for a selection of past films, watch or host a larger screening from the links below, and view films by submission year, county,
data.meta_site_name: Directing Change - California Youth Film Contest
data.text:
Please view and download the amazing films created by our young and talented filmmakers and check out this tip sheet for ideas to use the films. You can also check out our hand-outs for a selection of past films, watch or host a larger screening from the links below, and view films by submission year, county, or diverse community. We love to hear how you are using the films!

Hand-Outs.

The Directing Change team has created a series of hand-outs with a selection of films in each category:

Selection of Suicide Prevention PSAs

Selection of Mental Health PSAs

Selection of Through the Lens of Culture PSAs

Selection of Animated Short PSAs

Selection of Walk in Our Shoes PSAs

Selection of LGBTQ Films and Art

2023 Los Angeles County Films and Art

Screenings.

The following screenings include a selection of top films from the past few years, by category:

Suicide Prevention Screening

Mental Health Matters Screening

Through the Lens of Culture Screening

SanaMente Screening

Walk in Our Shoes Screening

Los Angeles County 2020 Screening

These student testimonials from program participants can also be used to share their films and their stories:

Student Testimonial: Puedo Enfrentarlo

Student Testimonial: Hashiru

Student Testimonial: We Don’t Do That

Student Testimonial: Abbreviated Soliloquies

StudentTestimonial: Choose to Stay

Student Testimonial: Our Battle

Films by County & for Diverse Communities.

In addition, you can view films by county and by specific, diverse communities:

Films by County

Films for Diverse Communities

2024 Winners

The following films are our regional and specialty category winners for 2024. Honorable Mentions for each category may be added, contingent upon receiving release forms.

View monthly Hope & Justice Category winners here
